column1: International Hospitality and Tourism Management MSc
column5: Ranked third by the Guardian 2020 league table for Tourism, Hospitality and Events courses you can be sure that your future is in safe hands.This course is designed to meet the increasing demand worldwide for graduates with the competencies and knowledge to operate as generalists in multiple parts of the Tourism and Hospitality industries and beyond. This is achieved by providing the transferrable specialist knowledge and skills that will enable graduates to communicate and manage effectively within a multi-cultural environment.
column7: UK Fees: 14250 ; 15450 (with Professional Practice)  International Fees: 17900 ; 18950 (with Professional Practice)
column9: 1 year full time, 18 months extended professional practice
